name: SRI NRUSINGHA DEV ANCHALIKA YUBA PARISADA

address: 3rd Lane, Guru Vihar, Sarvodaya Nagar, Puri-2 (Operating Office)

briefDescription: We are a grass root level social organization have been working on Community Based Rehabilitation of Person With Disabilities (PWDs) and specially focused upon the disable Children in Puri Sadar Block of Puri district of Orissa of India. There are so many problems exists with the PWDs/Children of these areas such as violation of rights, exploitation, trafficking, molestation, humiliation, harassment & domination to girl children. SNDAYP has been working with the PWDs like OH, CP, SP/HI, VI, MR, MI, Locomotors, autism & low vision  but we feel that a mass sensitization and lobby & advocacy is required for the encouragement of these special section of the society. We need help and support of various funding agencies like you to continue job.
